sentences.sContent: “Why would you ever go to school so far from home?” my friends would ask.
sentences.sContent_eng: “Why would you ever go to school so far from home?” my friends would ask.
sentences.sCn: 我在那边的朋友们会问我：“为什么你回去离家那么远的地方上学？

sentences.sContent: The boy refuses to go to school on [under] the pretext of illness [an ailment, sickness].
sentences.sContent_eng: The boy refuses to go to school on [under] the pretext of illness [an ailment, sickness].

sentences.sContent: In the morning, only one gate is open, through which parents head off to work and children go to school.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the morning, only one gate is open, through which parents head off to work and children go to school.
sentences.sCn: 每天早晨，只有一扇大门会打开，从这扇门出去父母们去上班，小孩们去上学。
